A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the full moon. The family just wants to fit in, and Alice (beginning to develop winged-hands and a horn in her head) is particularly desparate. She tries to get a job, but is rejected by the city of Omaha
